text: ehenam mage kollo kello tika danaganna meka thamayi eeka.

ithin podiyata patan gaththa me kukul kotuwe tika kalekin kikiliyo 6 kuth..kukullu 2 kuth unna.....eyala me kikiliyange biththara kamata gaththa ee wagema sathi anthe kusuma gedara yaddi game aran giya...mama podikale indanma saththunta godak aadarene,ithin iskole arila awith kama kala nowaradawama yanawa ge pitipassata kukullu tika balala enna...mama eyalata nam dala thibune,rathu kikili ''raththi''..
